intents.name: Greeting
responses: Hi! This is Raddaf, your real estate buddy. How may I help you today?

intents.name: IdentifyRole
questions: Are you looking to buy, sell, or rent a property?
Are you a tenant experiencing issues with your property?

intents.name: BuyerSellerOptions
responses: Here are some options for you:

intents.name: TenantOptions
responses: Here are some ways I can help:

intents.name: IssueInSale
questions: Why do you want to revert the listing request?

intents.name: RentLettedProperty
questions: Is the issue related to a property you currently own or want to rent out?

intents.name: LetLettingProperty
questions: Can you tell me more about the property you want to let?

intents.name: WebsiteProfileIssue
questions: Can you describe the issue you're experiencing?

intents.name: AgreementIssue
questions: What specific part of the agreement are you concerned about?

intents.name: Repairs
questions: What type of repair is needed?

intents.name: BillingIssue
questions: Can you explain the billing concern you have?

intents.name: SendFeedback
instructions: Send feedback with user contact information and details to relevant agent (Landlord/Zone Agent)

intents.name: End
responses: Your feedback has been sent, and an agent will contact you soon. Have a great day!
